packages.description: A texture for the Gold Tires.
packages.author: BluGoku

packages.name: bgbfsar
packages.title: Custom BFSAR soundpack
packages.description: This mod changes some of the SFX for a different experience. Here are some of the sounds in the mod: Boost Sound:  Sonic and Sega All Stars Racing Trick Sound:  Atlas Kart Wii v6 Warning Sound:  Thwomp falling from the Mario Party DS minigame Toppling Terror Lightning Sound:  Probably from a Sonic game again (idk either) Item Box Break and Roulette:  Mario Kart Wii
packages.author: BluGoke

packages.name: bggbaac
packages.title: GBA Autumnal Circuit
packages.description: This mod turns GBA Mario Circuit to look like if it took place in fall/autumn.
packages.author: BluGoku

packages.name: bggbaoc
packages.title: GBA Outback Circuit
packages.description: Here's another course texture for GBA Mario Circuit.  This time its a port of GBA Donut Circuit from Del's Modpack for MK8DX, but its called Outback Circuit because its like a dry-ish environment kinda like Dry Dry Desert, but with grass.
packages.author: BluGoku

packages.name: isabelletds
packages.title: Isabelle Toy Day Sweater
packages.description: A simple recolor of Isabelle/Shizue's sweater to be more festive with some presents on it from the Badge Arcade for some added detail.
packages.author: Sven Cakemann

packages.name: kamek
packages.title: Kamek over Larry
packages.description: The babysnatcher hits the track! Special thanks to KillzXGaming and AboodXD for their tools.
packages.author: Sven Cakemann

packages.name: monita
packages.title: Monita over Cat Peach
packages.description: Anticipating victory! That's right, Monita from Nintendo Land has joined the races! Thanks to KillzXGaming and AboodXD for tools and the MK8 Discord for inspiring the mod.
packages.author: Sven Cakemann

packages.name: mummyme
packages.title: Mummy Me over Toadette
packages.description: A quick and dirty skin for Toadette in time for Halloween.
packages.author: Sven Cakemann

packages.name: skybridgeddd
packages.title: The Sky Bridge (Shantae HGH) for Dry Dry Desert
packages.description: A song from one of my more recent favorite platforming franchises, Shantae: Half-Genie Hero. The final lap version of the track jumps straight into the main part of the piece now, so hopefully it's more exciting than the first release for those few that downloaded it when I uploaded it originally. Enjoy! Thanks to Atlas for the FLAP music tool and WayForward and Jake Kaufman for original music ownership.
packages.author: Sven Cakemann
